>
[Master Magus Ring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2327)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Arcane" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=11" />
<trait label="Focused" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=74" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 150 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Elegant jewelry such as the _master magus ring_ adorns experienced [magi](/Classes.aspx?ID=17). Each ring has a significant metal and symbol to represent a particular hybrid study, such as a heavy iron ring with an icon of a mountain for [inexorable iron](/HybridStudies.aspx?ID=1), or glittering silver with a shield-like emblem for [sparkling targe](/HybridStudies.aspx?ID=3). You gain a +2 item bonus to [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) checks.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You gain 1 Focus Point, which you can use only to cast a magus conflux spell. If not used by the end of your turn, this Focus Point is lost.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The ring transports you and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to an unoccupied space you can see within a range equal to your Speed. If this would bring another creature with you—even if you're carrying it in an [extradimensional](/Traits.aspx?ID=67) container—the activation fails and is used.

**Craft Requirements** You are a magus.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
